document.full_text: secondmarket, which offers an online platform to match buyers and sellers in privately held companies, is seeking u.s. approval to handle those transactions, according to the wall street journal on sunday.
document.title: secondmarket seeks guidance from u.s. regulator: wsj
lines_and_colors: secondmarket, which offers an online platform to match buyers and sellers in privately held companies, is seeking u.s. approval to handle those transactions, according to the wall street journal on sunday.
